author: proyal
msg: Use new concurrency primitives in the DefaultIoFuture. Changes external API slightly by throwing an InterruptedException (which is good, to force calling code to handle anyways). Remove un-used cxtor that took an external object to synchornize on, since it now uses a CountDownLatch

author: jvanzyl
msg: o adding the incomplete repository assembly that I started decoupling from the assembly plugin so that we do it in one place and not make 5 copies of the same tool again.
